key.name: location
key.description: Which screen edge to place the panel on

key.name: hide-policy
key.description: Hide the panel when it isn't being used

key.name: bounce-animation
key.description: Whether to enable bounce animations for auto hiding of the panel

key.name: pinned-launchers
key.description: Launchers that appear permanently on the panel, regardless of whether they are running or not.

key.name: app-scores
key.description: Counter for launched items, maintaining a "used" count for items in the menu.

key.name: size
key.description: Height of panel if horizontal, or the width if it is vertical

key.name: gnome-panel-theme-integration
key.description: Whether to enable GNOME Panel theme integration

key.name: dark-theme
key.description: Whether to use the dark theme variant globally

key.name: enable-shadow
key.description: Whether to enable an aesthetic drop shadow for the panel

key.name: enable-menu-label
key.description: Simply show the menu label on the menu button

key.name: menu-label
key.description: The menu label to display on the menu button

key.name: menu-icon
key.description: The icon to display on the main menu button

key.name: menu-icons-size
key.description: Icon size to use for buttons within the Budgie Menu

key.name: menu-compact
key.description: Whether to use a compact or full Budgie Menu (show categories)

key.name: edge-tiling
key.summary: Enable edge tiling when dropping windows on screen edges
key.description: This key overrides the key in org.gnome.mutter when running Budgie.

key.name: attach-modal-dialogs
key.summary: Attach modal dialog to the parent window
key.description: This key overrides the key in org.gnome.mutter when running Budgie.
